member.name: X3DAUDIO_LISTENER
member.summary: Defines a point of 3D audio reception.

member.name: X3DAUDIO_LISTENER.OrientFront
member.summary: Orientation of front direction. When pCone is NULL OrientFront is used only for matrix and delay calculations. When pCone is not NULL OrientFront is used for matrix, LPF (both direct and reverb paths), and reverb calculations. This value must be orthonormal with OrientTop when used.

member.name: X3DAUDIO_LISTENER.OrientTop
member.summary: Orientation of top direction, used only for matrix and delay calculations. This value must be orthonormal with OrientFront when used.

member.name: X3DAUDIO_LISTENER.Position
member.summary: Position in user-defined world units. This value does not affect Velocity.

member.name: X3DAUDIO_LISTENER.Velocity
member.summary: Velocity vector in user-defined world units per second, used only for doppler calculations. This value does not affect Position.

member.name: X3DAUDIO_LISTENER.pCone
member.summary: Pointer to an structure for this listener. Providing a listener cone will specify that additional calculations are performed when determining the volume and filter DSP parameters for individual sound sources. A NULL pCone value specifies an omnidirectional sound and no cone processing is applied. pCone is only used for matrix, LPF (both direct and reverb paths), and reverb calculations.
